title: Mom
subtle: Concept (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR90L
description: Mom is a simple story that allows students to follow along on a typical day as a mom interacts with her family. Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify characters and to recognize and use periods.
reviewWords: eyes, help, love, smile, tuck, voice
grammar: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word her
